body.name: Aveek Wireless Microphone Karaoke, Rechargeable Wireless Microphones with Receiver 2.4GHz Dual Dynamic Microphone for Karaoke Singing, Speech, Wedding, Church, Grey&Red,2 Packs
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Tuesday, February 20. Order within 14 hrs 13 mins
features: 🎤Rechargeable Microphone and Receiver: No need to purchase additional AA batteries.The microphone and receiver are both built-in rechargeable battery. work time up to 10 hours with charging time 3-4 hours.The 2 in 1 charging cable are included in package,support charging the microphone and receiver in one cable

🎤Compatibility: Excellent signal stability, compatible with Singing Machine,With Mic input Speaker(powered speaker), Audio Amplifier, Pa System, Mixer, Voice Amplifier And More Streaming Multimedia Equipment.Supports audio speaker with a 6.35mm or 3.5mm port

🎤Great Sound Quality: The wireless microphone adopts 2.4Ghz wireless transmission technology, provide a clear and crisp with no distortions whatsoever sound quality. and can be heard clearly at both indoor or outdoor parties with ease.great for home karaoke, performance, doing duets and public speaking
🎤Operating Range: Maximum 100 feet (the open area) to freely move around during performances Reliable signal and no worried about the sound will be cut in and out during use

🎤Plug and Play：There are a total of 16 channels to choose from for the microphone, (CH01-CH08 for CHA microphone, CH09-CH16 for CHB microphone), The receiver can handle both microphones at the same time and automatically captures the microphone channel. Just plug the receiver into a freestanding amplifier/speaker and karaoke is good to go.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars 2 mics for one input!
reviews.reviewText: This cordless mic pair work very well and give you two mics when you only have one input. The sound quality is good and well balanced between the two, and these give you the adjustability to make one hotter than the other and to switch channels in the event of interference. They are almost as hot as a corded Sennheiser I have plugged into the same PA, but stronger on the bass & mid-range, so I needed to adjust the tone a little to make them brighter. These are powered by rechargeable replaceable lithium ion batteries, charged by a USB-C connection. A charging cord is included that allows you to charge both mics at the same time from one USB charging block. The receiver/plug is also charged by a USB-C connection. They include foam windsocks and anti-roll rings for setting on a flat surface, the instruction booklet is in 5 languages. We use them for karaoke, we used to sing in a band so are familiar with different brands of mics. We used them for 3 hours and they still had plenty of charge left showing on the display. These mics are a good value and good quality for the price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good sound quality
reviews.reviewText: These have more than met my expectations. They not only look and feel nice but that sound nice too. I love that these can work in tandem with no complicated set up. Other than installing the batteries these is no real work to do to get these up and running. I plan on using these for my schools programs and that definitely get lound enough to project your voice clearly to a big crowd. They last along times and I appreciate they included an adapter for smaller AUX cable plug in.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good entry level karaoke set
reviews.reviewText: Been waiting for some friends to help us test out these mics. Finally had a karaoke party and wasn't as impressed as I had hoped.Had these charged up when I first got them, didn't use them for a few weeks, so I plugged them in Thurs before our Sat party.Come Sat, one said only 1 bar for battery life, the other was fully charged. So I plugged it back in, but only for 5 mins as we needed it again. This time, the battery said full charge. Both ran for 45-60 mins without any hiccups. Sound quality was ok, we tried it with the foam cover and we could barely hear it on the speaker, so off it came, and at full volume on the speaker, it was still not as loud as expected. Could just be that I was using a sound bar and not a full-fledged PA system.Distance was good, they worked from anywhere (ANYWHERE!!) in my 40' ranch house. So we did have a few people try them out in the basement bathroom.Overall, these did as advertised, I wish they were louder, not sure about the battery life as it kinda confused us, but we did enjoy them.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars WOW! These are great PA mic's for that price!
reviews.reviewText: At $40 these are some of the cheapest wireless microphones I have used. We use Shure or Sennheiser most of the time, but I decided to give these a chance as I needed something only for spoken word, not music, and didn't want to waste a a couple hundred dollars for a small event. These were far beyond my expectations, the range is very good, and the battery life was decent. We were able to use them at least 50 ft from the connector, and they did not falter once. They lasted for a 4 hour event and still had about half of their battery. The connector is battery powered as well, so no need to have it connected for a short period to a charger and you can use the lower wattage usb plugs on most speakers and it will keep it running indefinitely. Great set!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sleek appearance, warm sound, reliable connection
reviews.reviewText: These mics look great and sound better. Love the double ended charger that charges both mics at once. We had the dongle connected in the sound board at the back of the room, about 40+ ft. away. When the mics were first turned on, it did take a few seconds to connect, but once linked there was no lag or breakup anywhere in the room. No issue with batteries during two hours of use. Sound was clear and warm and (speaking) voices sounded rich and full. For most people, the mics did not need the cushion to prevent popping consonants. No feedback when mics were near each other. Nice and trouble free. Very happy with this item.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great set at a great price
reviews.reviewText: I’ve had another more expensive mic stop working before I got these and wow you just can’t trust high price tags anymore. Technology is advancing and everything is getting cheaper to build while being just as good as something that was more than double the price. They have decent range and sound quality. Better than my last mic actually. You can’t go wrong for the price and these should get the job done. Won’t exactly give you top tier studio performance but should be a great set for a low cost setting

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A must have microphone set for party.
reviews.reviewText: This karaoke microphone set offers an unparalleled experience, boasting a fast Bluetooth pairing function and a rechargeable battery that is truly game-changing. Upon use, the superior quality of these microphones becomes immediately apparent. The sound quality is impeccable, delivering stunning audio clarity, whether delivering powerful ballads or soft melodies. The battery life is sufficiently long-lasting, providing enough power to last for my entire party, while the bundled 2-in-1 charging cable ensures convenient recharging. This karaoke set is a must-have for any audio enthusiast seeking a top-tier audio experience.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Will not charge so they won’t work!!!!
reviews.reviewText: These are a waste of money… will not charge.. very disappointing…reviews were not bad but sadly I got a sack of lemons…Junk!!

reviews.reviewTitle: Buen kit con buen sonido aunque algo metálico y bajo
reviews.reviewText: 📦 Contenido: Incluye dos micrófonos inalámbricos, 2 pilas recargables de 1800mAh, un cable USB a 2 USB-C, el receptor con batería interna, libreto de instrucciones, dos capuchas anti consonantes oclusivas, adaptador de tipo de jack y dos bases antivibración para los micrófonos.✅ El kit es muy completo, incluyendo todo lo necesario para usar los micrófonos, cargarlos y conectarlos perfectamente.✅ Incluyen dos pilas de 1800 mAh que les da una autonomía muy larga de más de 9 horas.✅ Incluye la capucha para consonantes oclusivas que ayuda a reducir ruidos con "p", "t",...✅ El cable de carga es muy útil porque incluye dos salidas para poder cargar los dos micros a la vez. Hubiera estado mejor si terminara en tres para poder también cargar el receptor.✅ Las instrucciones están en varios idiomas entre ellos en español, cosa muy a agradecer.✅ Cada micrófono tienen 8 canales que son independientes por micro. Para hacer este ajuste tienes que quitar la parte inferior, cosa bastante útil para evitar que una vez configurado se pueda cambiar por error.✅ Permite 10 niveles de volumen. El nivel máximo no es muy alto. Lo he probado con un interfaz de audio y he tenido que subir bastante el volumen. Por otro lado para subir y bajar el volumen tienes que quitar la parte inferior, cosa que sería más útil poder cambiarla sin tener que desmontarlo.✅ La conexión es muy sencilla, solo tienes que encender el receptor, que mostrará dos luces parpadeando (una por micro) y enciendes cada uno de los micros y el receptor dejará la luz fija cuando lo detecte. Si ves que no te lo coge prueba a cambiar el canal y darle 10 segundillos.✅ La reducción de ruido es buena, solo obtiene prácticamente sonido por la parte superior cogiendo poco sonido ambiental.❌ La calidad del sonido es algo metálica📰 Conclusión: El kit es muy completo y el rango de distancia es buena. Para mi la única pega es la calidad y volumen del sonido que podría ser mejor.

Die Mikrofone in diesem >Aveek Wireless Microphone Set< gehören zumindest haptisch und funktionell zu den besten, die ich in dieser Preisklasse bisher in der Hand hatte.Der Sound ist ebenfalls recht gut, wenn auch ein wenig Mitten- und Basslastig. Da kann man zwar recht einfach mit einem entsprechenden Endgerät, welches über Höhen- Mitten- und Bassanpassung verfügt und damit natürlich auch deutlich teurer ist als eine kleine "Karaoke-Maschine", Abhilfe schaffen. Hier stellt sich halt die Frage ob man solch ein Endgerät hat, oder bereit ist darin zu investieren.Für den Ottonormalverbraucher im Heimgebrauch sind diese Mikrofone aber durchaus Zufriedenstellend und auch zu empfehlen, weshalb in meiner Bewertung auch immer noch 4 Sterne zusammenkommen!

reviews.reviewTitle: Ils fonctionnent surper bien ces 2 micros sans fil... à brancher sur une sono !
reviews.reviewText: J'aime bien la conception de ces 2 micros sans fil, rechargeables en USB-C avec une batterie amovible que l'on pourra facilement changer lorsqu'elle aura perdue son autonomie. Le fabricant annonce 10H de fonctionnement entre chaque recharge des 2 micros et du récepteur commun.Il suffit de brancher la prise jack 6.35 (un adaptateur 3.5mm est fourni) sur une entrée micro de sonorisation, ou sur une table de mixage... Les micros se connectent automatiquement lorsqu'on les met sous tension avec leur bouton poussoir intégré. Ils sont en plastique, mais avec une belle grille métallique cardioïde. 2 bonnettes sont fournies, et même 2 anneaux caoutchouc optionnels à glisser sur les micros pour les rendre moins sensibles aux chocs lors de leur utilisation.Le seul point faible concerne les bruits de manipulation des micros en main, qui s'entendent bien... Mais il suffit d'y faire attention pour qu'il n'y ait plus de problème.Et avec l'anneau caoutchouc (plus la bonnette), les micros tiennent parfaitement bien en main, sans aucun effort, car posés sur le haut de sa main fermée; surtout qu'ils sont légers. Ainsi, ils sont très agréable à tenir !Branchés sur ma petite sono... j'ai rajouté un soupçon d'écho à la voix, et c'est super !Je vous conseille ces micros sans fil (génials à l'usage), si vous avez un système de sonorisation, avec entrée micro "jack" : Ils ne fonctionnent pas sur PC.

Lot de 2 microphones avec récepteurs✅ Idéal pour un usage au travail ou à la maison, la qualité de song est très bonne, bien équilibré✅ Les appareils sont tous rechargeables, c'est excellent et bien plus pratique que mon modèle à piles✅ Longue portée, environ 30 mètres, ce qui suffit largement✅ Autonomie excellente également❌ Rien pour l'instantEn bref, des micros qui font parfaitement le travail, bonne qualité de son, autonomie et portée très bonne.
